description: Grit7z is a small plugin for the popular 7-Zip archiver. You can use Grit7z with 7-Zip to open, modify, or create .PAK archives, which are used in Chrome or Chromium-based browsers.
summary: You can u   Grit7z with 7-Zip to open, modify, or create .PAK archives, which are used in Chrome or Chromium-based browsers.
author: Dec Software
